message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $15,000.  I think it will be incredibly valuable for you, even more so than the initial price suggests. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but $15,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for it. Can you meet me at this price?
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but $10,000 is quite a bit lower than I'm hoping to get.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
I'm still interested in the product, but $13,000 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for it. Can you consider this price?
